name: sh0le

-| wceq(c0h, csn(c0v))
-| wi(wcel(c0, csh), wss(csn(c0v), c0))

|- wi(wcel(c0, csh), wss(c0h, c0))
-| wi(wcel(c0, csh), wss(csn(c0v), c0))

body.origin:

comment: The zero subspace is the smallest subspace. (Contributed by NM, 3-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
